snippet: Bulgarian officials released a brief video clip recorded by an airport security camera on Wednesday of the man they identified as the bomber who killed Israeli tourists in the resort town of Burgas a day earlier.
abstract: Bulgarian officials released a brief video clip recorded by an airport security camera on Wednesday of the man they identified as the bomber who killed Israeli tourists in the resort town of Burgas a day earlier.

headline.main: Video Shows Suspected Bomber Before Deadly Attack on Israelis in Bulgaria
